org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap
Class SearchableLdapUserAndGroupServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap.SearchableLdapUserAndGroupServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, LdapUserAndGroupService, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class SearchableLdapUserAndGroupServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements LdapUserAndGroupService, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

An implementation of LdapUserAndGroupService that delegates to two instances of CachingLdapEntityServiceImpl.

See Also:
